pages.text: $(li)The Dropper is a block that can be used to eject items or to push items that are saved in its inventory into another container.$(br)$(li)It will be turned on when receives a redstone pulse.

$(li)This item can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/dispenser)Dispenser$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:redstone/inspirations/collector)Collector$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
